website_summaries.verdict: Maximize a chin-up bar workout with a sturdy product with a strong grip.
pros: One of the few products that can hold up to nearly 400 pounds of weight
Easily adjusts to different body shapes and sizes
Priced well for those who work out often
cons: May not be sized for all  lengths

customer_reviews.title: The straps are fairly sturdy. But I would not purchase this brand again
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. The carabiners were not as big as I was hoping. They do not fit around any pull up bar I have. They come with straps that you can wrap around the bar. But they are long and awkward. The straps are fairly sturdy. But I would not purchase this brand again
customer_reviews.author: Vaughan Twigger

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best sets of hanging straps you can find -  sturdy and strong is key points
customer_reviews.text: Work as advertised - was going to send them back - but decided to keep them for possible future use as I come up to the necessary strength level required. Very well built - strong construction - outstanding hooks. They must must be one of the better (maybe best) straps on Amazon. Highly recommend them - - you should not be disappointed in their performance. As recommended, use them wisely - check for fatigue (stitching failures) over time. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Inquiring Minds

customer_reviews.title: very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Gym hanging abs straps are very strong and good quality, specially in my case since I have them hanging in my back yard, although they are not exposed to the sun and they are in a covered area but time wear as well as exposure to the air sometimes take a big token on them.
customer_reviews.author: alex11603

customer_reviews.title: Better than i expected
customer_reviews.text: These things have good sturdy quality. They are thick and the metal hooks that come with them are very thick and great. I love these so much!
customer_reviews.author: Tbee8421

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have only used thus item a handful of times but I like this item a lot. Looks to be well made and the caribeners are heavy duty. I don't use the bar straps at home (it would make my legs hit the floor) but I can see bar straps being useful if I take this to the gym
customer_reviews.author: Dat Luong

customer_reviews.title: Great straps!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my straps and make doing hanging ab crunches very comfortable on my arms. Only draw back is the size and thickness of the rings, they wouldn't attach to my pull up bar but I found a way to make it work. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just the help I needed to assist with ab work!
customer_reviews.author: CLPshopper

customer_reviews.title: This product needs the snap spring loaded hook to be ...
customer_reviews.text: This product needs the snap spring loaded hook to be two sizes bigger and oval shaped.I have to look for a bigger set of hooks to fit the 1 inch bar. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Imber Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes them very much. Good quality and safety!
customer_reviews.author: Swent

customer_reviews.title: Well made, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Carabinets supplied too small to clip onto standard pull up bars, but that was expected. Otherwise well made.
customer_reviews.author: B. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Easy to place
customer_reviews.text: The slings work really well. Easy to place. Very satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Howard A. Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The straps were just as advertised and are just the quality I had hoped for. They came to me on time with no hassle. I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Wallace

customer_reviews.title: As good as the ones at the gym and better than ...
customer_reviews.text: As good as the ones at the gym and better than the crap at Academy Sports. These straps have a sturdy construction and adequate comfort. I would definitely purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm 240 pound. I was skeptical it could carry my wait but it's string as hell!
customer_reviews.author: Eid Shekhaidem

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it! He said he started to feel his ab muscles building up after a few tries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Wish the clearance of the hooks was ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Wish the clearance of the hooks was larger because don't like using the slings; like to hook directly to the pull up bar. The diameter of the Everlast Pull Up Bar is too large for the hooks, so had to use a hammer to remove one of the end caps.
customer_reviews.author: Hodi

customer_reviews.title: a bit long but they serve their purpose
customer_reviews.text: Attached these to my universal gym. Kind of long but they serve my abs workout just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: The quality exceeded my expectations on this product. Extremely comfortable and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Kosta Vasilakis

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, clamps are a bit heavy for my taste
customer_reviews.author: Luis F.

customer_reviews.title: It is painful to my rotator cuffs to do hanging leg raises
customer_reviews.text: It is painful to my rotator cuffs to do hanging leg raises, these are the perfect solution for allowing me to do leg raises without causing pain to my rotator cuffs.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: they're perfect. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The carbinger opening is too small to clip onto my doorway pullup bar. Took me a minute or two to unscrew the bar from the doorway slip the carbingers over the end and on to the bar and then screw the bar back on to the wall. Once the ab straps were up though, they're perfect. Sturdy, work as advertised. Just had to think a little bit out of the box in order to get it on to the pull-up bar.
customer_reviews.author: Kaaron

customer_reviews.title: Holds my fat a$$ up
customer_reviews.text: Holds my fat a$$ up, was very surprised it didn't snapped. It doesn't irritate the arms either.
customer_reviews.author: AdminX

product_meta.title: Hipiwe Pair of Gym Hanging Ab Straps with Quick Locks Fitness Sling Abdominal Straps
product_meta.description:
Description:

Enhance your workouts with these Ab Straps.

Great Heavy duty and Ultra Sturdy AB Straps, Wide and Padded straps for comfort.

Helps develop ab muscles and upper body strength.

Easily attaches to any standard chin-up bar.

Achieve greater isolation during leg lift exercises.

Strong sweat and rip resistant nylon for ultimate durability.

Package Included:

1 x Hanging Ab Straps
feature_bullets: Durable heavy-duty rip resistant nylon and Heavy-duty steel carabiner attachments
Easily attaches to any standard chin-up bar
Helps develop ab muscles and upper body strength
Wide and Padded straps minimize stress to the arms and maximize comfort. Long handles provide a more comfortable grip and greater stabilization
Maximum load: 396 lb. Package include: One pair ab straps

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
